pass:
13+ PC, any distribution (but see 2♦︎ opening)
1♣︎:
A) 11+ PC, any distribution or B) 6-10 PC, 1) no shortness, no 54 majors, no 6-card major 2) 44(41) 3) (42)(61) 4) 7-card minor, inappropriate hand for 1♥︎/♠︎
1♦︎:
A) 17+ PC, any distribution or B) 13-16 PC, 1) no shortness, no 54 majors, no 6-card major 2) 44(41) 3) (42)(61) 4) 7-card minor, inappropriate hand for 1♥︎/♠︎
